titles.title: A resolution expressing the support of Congress for the observation of the National Moment of Remembrance at 3:00 pm local time on this and every Memorial Day to acknowledge the sacrifices made on the behalf of all Americans for the cause of liberty.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 5/23/2005--Introduced. Reaffirms support for the National Moment of Remembrance at 3:00 P.M. on Memorial Day, to honor the men and women who died in the pursuit of freedom and peace. Urges the people of the United States to observe such Moment so that the sacrifices of those who died are not forgotten.
